title: Autistic Syndrome 1
creator_credit: Wetenschap Universitaire Film and Stichting Film
brief_description: Presents some aspects of psychotherapy in a three year old autistic girl during her first year of residential treatment. We see her with her twin sister and with her therapist. A year later the twin sisters are observed with interest focused on changes in behaviour. No other credits available.
